text:
@realDonaldTrump He’s Governor Cuomo, donald.
It’s called, COVID-19, not the, “Chinese virus”.
Supposedly, you are the president of all 50 states, and while I realize that number may be too high for you to count, it is so.
You have a grudge against your former home state. 
Keep grudges out of it. https://t.co/HqRUj3I7y1
